description: Construction of an additional two floors on the building to provide a 6th and 7th storey,  and change of use from office / training use (Use Class B1 / D1) to provide 319 sqm retail/commercial space (Use Class A1 / B1) on the ground floor and 28 residential units above comprising 5 x 1-bed, 20 x 2-bed, 3 x 3-bed flats together with associated access, servicing, car parking, cycle parking and landscaping.
